name: Balance Bear
description:
Game created by Sammy Gaskins and Cameron Minor.

You are the Balance Bear! Chosen among your people to defend the pancake against the ravenous birds! How long can you keep the pancake away from the hands (or talons) of the birds who have forsaken you for so long?

Pancake sprite from: https://pixabay.com/vectors/breakfast-pancakes-stack-syrup-1295968/

Bear and Bird sprites from: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/animal-pack-redux

Background image from: https://opengameart.org/content/kitchen-background-4-styles

Original music by Cameron Minor.
